name: MIKY - Naughty Chat & Dress Up
description:
MIKY is a new way to make friends, create and styler your avatar, and invite friends !

Are you getting tired of your life and want to have some fun? Try MIKY to experience virtual dress up game and live chat.

MIKY is for people to satisfy your desire to dress up in virtual games, also provide a platform to chat with new friends.

In the beautiful sunshine town, You can dress up your own character freely, a variety of free collocations, dazzling suits are waiting for you to choose.

Dress up your character: we offer beautiful skirts and swimsuits, hairstyles for everyone to choose from. Collect beautiful costumes and pet dragon babies to dress up your town and make it look even more beautiful.

Ready to get hooked in MIKY now?
